alert.note: Alert for Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 01 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Houston County through 430 PM CDT... At 400 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cottonwood, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dothan, Taylor, Midland City, Kinsey, Ashford, Cowarts, Webb, Rehobeth, Avon, Memphis, Green Acres, Pearce, Enon, Lovetown, Wilson Mill, Kelly Springs, Barber, Olympia Spa Resort, Keytons and Pleasant Plains. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
